p: Stem barks of C. siamea were collected among the trees in the savannah scattered vegetation of Azare, in Katagum Local Government located between latitude 11° 40′ 35″ N and longitude 10° 11′ 41″ E, Nigeria. Cassia siamea with the voucher specimen number 900078 was authenticated and deposited at the Department of Biological Sciences herbarium of Bauchi State University Gadau, Nigeria.
